description.narrative: EDUCATION AND OUTREACH - THROUGH THIS PROGRAM, WE PROVIDE TRAINING TO BUILD PARTICIPANTS' CAPACITY TO DRIVE CHANGE WITHIN THEIR ORGANIZATIONS, WE SPEAK AT AND MODERATE HIGH-LEVEL PUBLIC EVENTS ON BUSINESS AND HUMAN RIGHTS, AND WE SHARE OUR LEARNING AND INSIGHTS GAINED THROUGHOUT IN-PERSON ENGAGEMENTS AND COLLABORATIONS VIA OUR ONLINE RESOURCE LIBRARY.

activity-date.narrative: EDUCATION AND OUTREACH - THROUGH THIS PROGRAM, WE PROVIDE TRAINING TO BUILD PARTICIPANTS' CAPACITY TO DRIVE CHANGE WITHIN THEIR ORGANIZATIONS, WE SPEAK AT AND MODERATE HIGH-LEVEL PUBLIC EVENTS ON BUSINESS AND HUMAN RIGHTS, AND WE SHARE OUR LEARNING AND INSIGHTS GAINED THROUGHOUT IN-PERSON ENGAGEMENTS AND COLLABORATIONS VIA OUR ONLINE RESOURCE LIBRARY.
